nodes.text: Mandellia was a shadowport used by pirates during the Great Galactic War. It came to end one day when Nok Drayen demanded its surrender. The pirates refused, so Nok sent one single rocket to the settlement that tipped an Imperial nerve toxin storage. The entire settlement of about ten thousand pirates died in less than a minute, and their riches made Drayen one of the wealthiest criminals in the galaxy.
Risha's story never specifies whether Mandellia was the name of a planet, moon, asteroid or space station. Its status as a shadowport is made abundantly clear, however.
